title: 비교하는 대화 듣기
description: 비교급과 최상급을 사용한 비교 대화를 듣고 이해합니다.

audio.text: Hi, I'm Jennifer. [PAUSE] I want to tell you about my family. [PAUSE] I have two brothers. My older brother Tom is taller than me, but I'm smarter than him in school. [PAUSE] My younger brother Jake is the shortest in our family, but he's the funniest person I know. [PAUSE] My mom is more patient than my dad. She's also a better cook. [PAUSE] My dad is the strongest person in our family. He can lift heavy things easily. [PAUSE] I think my family is the best family in the world! We're not perfect, but we're happier than most families I know.

targetSentences: My older brother Tom is taller than me.
My younger brother Jake is the shortest in our family.
